description: Energy Conservation in Small Sector Tea Processing Units in South India

subproject.description: Energy conservation in tea processing units in South India, thereby restricting green house gases emissions.  Project also aims at removing barriers and developing replicable strategies for energy efficient conservation intervention in the tea processing industries.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
